name: io.github.kkjdaniel/bgg-mcp
title: BoardGameGeek MCP Server
description: BoardGameGeek MCP server providing access to BGG API data through standardized tools

environmentVariables.name: BGG_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: API key for BoardGameGeek authentication (recommended). Obtain from https://boardgamegeek.com/applications

environmentVariables.name: BGG_COOKIE
environmentVariables.description: Cookie string for BGG authentication (alternative to API key). Format: 'bggusername=user; bggpassword=pass; SessionID=xyz'

environmentVariables.name: BGG_USERNAME
environmentVariables.description: Your BoardGameGeek username for references such as ME or MY in prompts
